name: LGBTQ+ TEST
description:
LGBTQ+ TEST

The LGBTQ+ TEST is a game in which you need to guess who is depicted in the photo
and what type of gender a person belongs to.
The game contains all types of gender and not only

With the help of this game, you will begin to understand genders like no other.

Features:
  • The first game in which you will have the opportunity to learn all types of genders

  • Smart music

  • Nice interface

    Play and learn!
